channel.title: CVE Feed for Open Networking Foundation (ONF) -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Open Networking Foundation (ONF) -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-31165|2024-09-18T13:54:49.938Z -- open%20networking%20foundation%20%28onf%29 -- libfluid
item.description:
Unchecked Return Value to NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in Open Networking Foundation (ONF) libfluid (libfluid_msg module). This vulnerability is associated with program routine fluid_msg::of13::SetFieldAction::unpack.
This issue affects libfluid: 0.1.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-31172|2024-09-18T13:56:04.027Z -- open%20networking%20foundation%20%28onf%29 -- libfluid
item.description:

This issue affects libfluid: 0.1.0.
